components.construct: DO.Core.Renderer.UI.SpriteButton(assets, 'Buttons:Continue_Normal.png', 'Buttons:Continue_Disable.png', '@collect_caps', 1, {fontFamily : 'Berlin-Sans-FB-Demi-Bold', fontSize: 30, fill : 0xFFFFFF, align : 'center', dropShadow : true, dropShadowBlur : 20,  dropShadowDistance :0, fill : ['#FFFFFF','#FFFFFF ']})

DO.Core.Renderer.UI.StandardText('@congratulations_caps', {fontFamily : 'Roboto-Bold', fontSize: 42, fill : 0xfff000, align : 'center', stroke:'0x115328',strokeThickness : 3 ,dropShadow : true, dropShadowBlur : 20, fill : ['#F7DC13','#E58305']})

DO.Core.Renderer.UI.StandardText('@spot_bonus_every_spin', {fontFamily : 'Roboto-Bold', fontSize: 37, fill : 0xfff000, align : 'center', stroke:'0x115328',strokeThickness : 3 ,dropShadow : true, dropShadowBlur : 20, fill : ['#F7DC13','#E58305']})
DO.Core.Renderer.UI.StandardText('', {fontFamily : 'Roboto-Bold', fontSize: 100, fill : 0xfff000, align : 'center' ,dropShadow : true, dropShadowBlur : 20, fill : ['#02DDF3']})
